newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Yeltsin seeks explanation of anti-Lebed charges.
newsitem.headline: Yeltsin seeks explanation of anti-Lebed charges.

text.p: President Boris Yeltsin, worried by accusations against his security chief Alexander Lebed, on Wednesday asked Prime Minister Viktor Chernomyrdin to explain what was going on, a presidential spokesman said.

A Yeltsin spokesman said the president, who is preparing for heart surgery at a sanatorium outside Moscow, told Chernomyrdin and Interior Minister Anatoly Kulikov to give details of the news conference in which Kulikov made his accusations against Lebed.
Kulikov told the news conference Lebed planned to seize power in Russia by force. Lebed denied the accusations.
